remarks:
If ` x ` is not free in ` ph ` and ` ps ` , it is not free in ` ( ph /\ ps ) ` .  (Contributed by NM, 14-May-1993.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 2-Jan-2018.) 

---

 If ` x ` is not free in ` ph ` and ` ps ` , it is not free in ` ( ph /\ ps ) ` .  (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 2-Feb-2015.)
statement:
hb.1 $e |- ( ph -> A. x ph ) $.
hb.2 $e |- ( ps -> A. x ps ) $.
hban $p |- ( ( ph /\ ps ) -> A. x ( ph /\ ps ) ) $.
